response.original_title: Return to Glory: Detroit Red Wings 2008 Stanley Cup Champions
response.overview: Come along for a magical ride with the 2008 Detroit Red Wings in this special collector's edition DVD set. This four-disc compilation includes the entire broadcast of all six games from the memorable Stanley Cup Final against the Pittsburgh Penguins. Relive all the sights and sounds from Detroit's 11th Stanley Cup Championship - their fourth title in 11 years - and go inside the glass with one of hockey's greatest franchises. Experience the nail biting drama all over again, the big goals and the show stopping saves...and celebrate one more championship run with the heroes of Hockeytown.
response.title: Return to Glory: Detroit Red Wings 2008 Stanley Cup Champions
